summary: Implements an in‑memory mock of the AWS Elastic Load Balancing v2 service, providing lightweight stand‑in objects for load balancers, listeners, listener rules, target groups, actions, health status, and a backend that handles creation, configuration, validation, tagging, certificate handling, and CloudFormation integration for testing purposes.
business_intent: Enables developers to test and develop code that interacts with ELBv2 APIs without contacting real AWS infrastructure by supplying a fully simulated load‑balancer environment.
